QuestData.Title: Banished From the Sky
QuestData.Description: The Adherents have been casting their enemies into the hollow for generations.$B$BThe pools carry Sethe's dying curse, crippling arakkoa with visions of darkness and intense pain. The mind reels, the body writhes, and the wings wither.$B$BMost arakkoa die or go insane. Only the strongest can resist - seek them out and use the Eye of Anzu to help them to their senses.$B$BBeware, for the worshippers of Sethe also prey on these survivors to fill their ranks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Eye of Anzu on 8 Cursed Arakkoa.
QuestData.CompletionText: Without Anzu's gift, the curse would have consumed us all.
QuestData.RewardText: They have suffered a fate worse than death, but at least they are free.
